channel.title: Flood on Boris Gailleton
channel.description: Recent content in Flood on Boris Gailleton

item.title: CNES-Funded Flood Risk at Scale
item.description: Continental pilot that fuses satellite SAR passes with reduced-order hydrodynamics to map risk bands within hours of acquisition.

item.title: GraphFlood
item.description: Graph-based 2D flood approximator I co-developed for coupling rivers with landscape models.
